unreachable.title: Connect using Wifi
unreachable.step_1: Approach the main entrance of your building
unreachable.step_2: Switch on the Wifi connection of your smartphone and select network ARBALET_FRONTAGE
unreachable.step_3: Close warnings stating that you are not connected to Internet and come back here to play

message.not_available: Adminitrator has disabled Arbalet Frontage. Come back later.
message.forced: Administrator has locked Arbalet Frontage. Come back later.
message.down_alert: Arbalet Frontage is not up yet. Come back from

Flags.description: Light Arbalet Frontage to the colors of your country!
Flags.name: Flags

SweepRand.name: Dual colors
SweepRand.description: Animate Arbalet Frontage with dual colors.

SweepAsync.name: Color wheel
SweepAsync.description: Display the full color wheel, each window at a different pace.

options.title: Color's Wheels
options.rules: You will see the full color wheel, each window at a different pace.

Tetris.name: Tetris
Tetris.description: Play this well known arcade game on a giant facade.

options.title: Rules of the game
options.rules: Eliminate as much columns as you can. Tetrominos drop from left to right. Use the action button to rotate them. Although door steps of the building are invisible, their pixels are part of the game.

Snake.name: Snake
Snake.description: Play a Snake and eat apples.

options.title: Rules of the game
options.rules: You will be a red snake eating green apples. You can cross walls, in that case you' be spawned at the other side, but do not eat your tail! Although door steps of the building are invisible, their pixels are part of the game.

Drawing.name: Freehand Draw
Drawing.description: Draw on Arbalet Frontage with a colour palette.

options.title: How to draw ?
options.rules: You will be able to draw your own patterns on Arbalet Frontage by clicking a color from the palette and swiping your finger on a pixel. Colouring a pixel in equivalentblack is  to switching it off.

admin.rules: For commemoration having specific visual representations, this app allows the administrator to set a custom pattern in the daily schedule by saving his/her drawing.

Snap.name: Live
Snap.description: Learning computer programming with a playful and creative approach by creating your own light animation thanks to this visual programming language.

options.title: Snap
options.rules: Each participant has a laptop or tablet. He connects to Wifi network ARBALET_FRONTAGE and loads "live.arbalet-project.org" in a Web browser, selects a nickname and create his own coloured animation. Administrator selects which nickname live controls Frontage.

home.text_1: Arbalet Frontage is an architectural lighting of your building. Daily at dusk, its window light up in colors.
home.text_2: It gives you the opportunity to interact and learn with the environment around you.
home.text_3: By connecting, you will be able to change colors of the facade, enjoy gaming, or even learn computer programming during workshops with a trainer

close.title: Access denied
close.message: Sorry, you can no longer play. Please retry.

expire.title: Time is over
expire.message: Your turn is over, it is time to let other people play!

unknown.title: Unexpected message
unknown.message: We received an unexpected message, please update your app from the store

outdated.title: Upgrade Needed
outdated.message: Sorry, the version of your application is outdated. Please update it from your app store and retry.

tetris_block.howto_play_goal: The goal of Tetris Blocks is to stop blocks from leaving the inside of the outer gray hexagon.
tetris_block.howto_play_tap_keyboard: Press the right and left arrow keys to rotate the hexagon
tetris_block.howto_play_tap_screen: Tap the left and right sides of the screen to rotate the hexagon
tetris_block.howto_play_instructions_1: Clear blocks and get points by making 3 or more blocks of the same color touch.
tetris_block.howto_play_instructions_2: Time left before your combo streak disappears is indicated by colored lines on the outer hexagon
tetris_block.short_howto_play_1_keyboard: Use the right and left arrow keys
tetris_block.short_howto_play_1: Tap the screen's left and right

kicked.title: Access denied
kicked.message: Sorry, you can no longer play.
